To anyone in the group who lives in Japan. Ihave a chance to become employe=
d at a english language school in Japan Iam curious as to how they treat Ga=
ijin and what to expect? Also Iwill be wanting to bring two swords into the=
 country with me One is a mass produced katana type it is a copy of Mugens =
blade and the second is a pattern welded Han Dynasty long sword I have the =
makers letter to go with it. What if any restrictions will I encounter?
